entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High plus 3.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2.
